title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user goes to Preferences -> Workbench and selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification". The build menu option still appears in the Java popup menus. This behavior is incorrect and shouldn't happen.
OB: The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu is always enabled, even when the option to perform build automatically is selected in Preferences -> Workbench.
EB: The "Build" action should only be enabled in the context sensitive popup menu if the build is not already done automatically.
SR:
1. Open Preferences -> Workbench.
2. Select "Perform build automatically on resource modification".
3. Open the Java perspective.
4. Right-click on a resource to open the context sensitive popup menu.
5. Observe that the "Build" action is enabled even if the build is already done automatically.
